analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0x8f7a9b503aa7f9255368bd34d01aea2b502164c2.sol:
	Contract BrylliteToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0x8f7a9b503aa7f9255368bd34d01aea2b502164c2.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BrylliteToken.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/4/0x8f7a9b503aa7f9255368bd34d01aea2b502164c2.sol#394-396) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/4/0x8f7a9b503aa7f9255368bd34d01aea2b502164c2.sol)
